timeline.message: NXP-29791: forbid deletion of the main blob of a document under retention / legal hold

timeline.bodyText:
Testing for "empty" is wrong, it's legal too have a blob containing a 0-byte content.
Even though for now this is used in cases where the difference doesn't really matter (binary fulltext), it's not the case in general.
